Source.Name: ttyplot
Source.Summary: realtime plotting utility for terminal/console with data input from stdin
Source.Description: takes data from standard input / unix pipeline, most commonly some tool like ping, snmpget, netstat, ip link, ifconfig, sar, vmstat, etc. and plots in text mode on a terminal in real time
